data.title: Musk Tweets Out Another Tesla Production Forecast
data.text: Elon Musk posted another Tesla Inc. production forecast reminiscent of the one that landed him before a federal judge earlier this month.

data.title: Impulsive Tweets By Musk And Trump Move Markets: Should Both Be Regulated?
data.text: Tesla CEO Elon Musk is not the only powerful Tweeter whose tweets move the market. Donald Trump's many reckless tweets also cause stock prices to rise and fall.

data.title: Elon Musk's latest tweet raises concern amid SEC talks
data.text: Tesla CEO Elon Musk tweeted again about production numbers, tweeting, "Tesla will make over 500K cars in the next 12 months," despite having a court order to work out differences with the Securities Exchange Commission.

data.title: Tesla: On The Verge Of A Technical Breakdown
data.text: I examined the long-term technical outlook for Tesla.
